The details (from wikipedia)

Biography

Sahar Dolatshahi (Persian: سحر دولتشاهی‎; born 8 October 1979 in Tehran) is an Iranian film, television and stage actress. She is a graduate of the Department of Dramatic and Translational Literature in French. In the film "Gold and Copper" directed by Homayoun Asadiyan in 2011, she was nominated for the Best Female Actor Award from the 14th Cinema House Celebration. In the thirty-third festival of Fajr Film Festival, Sahar Dolatshahi won the Best Actress in the film "Ice Age".

Biography

She began her artistic career in the theater, which, of course, played in the theater, had good opportunities to introduce her to cinema and television. She was married to Rambod Javan On March 27, 2008, and she is divorced now.Homayoun Shajarian [m.2018]
